title: (x) Life cereal logo - ITC Eras {Yves}
content:
Anyone have a guess what font the letters in LIFE are? Or where I can download?

author: dfx_3000

comments.content:
This series of packaging posts is beginning to look like an addendum to the [‘Tasty Type’ (a.k.a Fonts on Food)](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185531/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/food_packaging_fonts.cfm) news feature by Fontshop in their e-mail news this month.

- Mike Yanega
